pr_title: CB-8822 npe check in sdxinternaltestdto investigate

timeline.author: Bajzathd

replies.bodyText: so you mean audit info still useful, whether stackresponse is null? is that what you meant?
replies.author: afarsang

replies.bodyText: I think it can be as it already had a crn, because without it could not have caused an NPE.
replies.author: Bajzathd

replies.bodyText: other testdtos had the potential issue too, it was a good idea to check them. Thanks
replies.author: afarsang
